description: This file declares the interface for a COSA Library plugin, including initialization, support verification, and unload functions. It contains macro definitions, function prototypes, and C linkage specifications, serving as a header for plugin APIs.

methods.name: COSA_Init
methods.description: Initializes the COSA plugin with a maximum supported version and plugin info handle.

methods.name: COSA_IsObjSupported
methods.description: Checks if a specified object name is supported by the plugin.

methods.name: COSA_Unload
methods.description: Performs cleanup and unloads the plugin.
